@dingo777  
ok so what your saying is "i am prepared on turn 5 for a 5/4 with haste by chump and or multiblocking down this 5/4 flyer, But i sure hope there isn't more then one coming at me"  
  
the problem is   
a) your playing vs black and/or red meaning that your probably not going to have flyers and if you do i'm betting they're taped. and  
b) Your saying the deck using demigod of revenge is not too much of a problem if they don't have more then 1. except they will because there using demigod of revenge.  
  
  
furthermore demigods ability triggers on cast not on successful cast meaning unless your counter spell has a exile component, he's kinda uncountable.

posts.post_content:
Come on people. We all know removal exists. You might as well go into a discussion for [Doom Blade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doom Blade) and say "Black creatures are immune to this spell".
  
Unless you have protection from white, blue, black, and red, removal works against everything!
  
If you are one of those people who is thinking of typing "removal", don't.
  
I have one thing to say to you people. Yes, [Boomerang](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Boomerang) and [Path to Exile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Path to Exile) trump almost everything in the game. We all know this. It's a fact of magic, creatures are easily removed.
  
That being said, this creature is without a doubt, freakin' awesome.
  
His only true grave belongs in Elysium.
  
5/5
  
   
@ClockworkSwordfish : LMAO. Too true. Hahaha. You actually made me fall out of my chair, laughing.
